EmailTemplate.subject: Step Forward: apply today!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
The Challenge Presents: Step Forward
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
As an NCS Graduate, you recently received an email about Step Forward, a school leavers programme designed to help you get ahead. Are you looking for experience that will help you stand out from the crowd? Want support from a team of friends as well as your own personal mentor?
Make sure you apply today to be considered for our next assessment event!
www.stepforward.uk.com
"We value highly the transferable and personal skills developed on programmes such as Step Forward " - Partner at Hogan Lovells, International Law Firm
Remind me again, what is Step Forward?
Step Forward is a London based 12 month programme for school and college leavers. Whether you plan to go to university, straight into the world of work or are still making your decision, it gives you the skills required to succeed in your future career.
Young people who are accepted onto Step Forward gain:
Invaluable experience with quality employers Comprehensive personal and professional development training and a nationally recognised qualification The advice and support of a trained mentor £9000 paid salary
What next?
You can secure your future today by filling out our 10 minute application. Please login to our website using your email address and pin/password below.
www.stepforward.uk.com
Email: {!Contact.Email}
Pin: {!Contact.Login_PIN__c}
Password: {!Contact.Login_Password__c}
In order to be considered for our next assessment events on Saturday 5th and 12th December we must receive your application by Sunday 29th November. Step Forward is a competitive programme, and places are limited so don’t miss out!
Best wishes,
Step Forward
www.stepforward.uk.com
